known_evidence: BRAF+MEK + ribociclib: Phase 1/2 ORR 39% (after BRAF+MEK progression)
BRAF+MEK resistance: EGFR feedback reactivation common mechanism; triple blockade proposed (Prahallad et al. Nature 2012)
BEACON triplet arm (+ binimetinib): ORR 26% vs 20% doublet
BRAF+EGFR resistance: PI3K pathway reactivation; triple proposed (Corcoran et al. Cancer Discov 2012)
EGFR+MET resistance: MEK pathway activation (Oxnard et al. JCO 2018)
CDK4/6 inhibition sensitizes EGFR-TKI resistant NSCLC (Tong et al. Oncogene 2019)
HER2+HR+ breast: PI3K pathway drives resistance to CDK4/6i + HER2; alpelisib added (AndrÃ© et al. NEJM 2019)
mTOR activation in CDK4/6i-resistant HER2+ breast (Herrera-Abreu et al. Cancer Res 2016)
Liaki et al. PNAS 2025: tri-axial blockade KRAS+EGFR+STAT3, complete regression >200d
